details.description:
John Murray is a freelance data scientist with over 30 years’ experience in building customer information systems for predictive analytics. During this time he has worked extensively with survey and census data, pioneering commercially successful analytical solutions to improve marketing efficiency and reduce fraud for household name companies.

John is a strong advocate of open data, and has worked with universities and other leading organisations to increase awareness of the economic benefits it can bring to businesses.
